text.autoconfig.dynmus.title: Dynamic Music Config (Hover over options)
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.searchRang:
Number of blocks in each direction.
0 disables cave detection.
Used for 'Cave Music' and 'Dynamic Pitch'
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.darknessCa: Light level of blocks used for cave detection.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.darknessPe: Percent of blocks with low light levels to trigger cave detection.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.stonePerce: Percent of stone to trigger cave detection
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.pseudoMine:
Number of blocks in each direction.
0 disables mineshaft detection.
Used to activate 'Dynamic Pitch' in mineshafts.
Percent of mineshaft blocks for mineshaft detection.
Play cold music in cold biomes.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.hotMusic.@: Play hot music in hot biomes.
Play nice music during the day.
Play down/sad music during the night and while it rains.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.endCreativ:
Play original music composed by LudoCrypt
when in creative mode in the End dimension.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.endBossMus:
Play original music composed by LudoCrypt
when fighting the dragon in the End dimension.
text.autoconfig.dynmus.option.dynamicPit: The closer the time is to the Anchor, the slower the music plays.
The anchor that the Dynamic Pitch uses. 18000 being midnight.
Choose to play music faster, rather than slower
